ForgetPasswordMessage: Please enter your email address to search for your account.
addYourOffer: Apologies, it seems you don't have any offers at the moment. To add a new offer, please click on the 'Add Offer' button or navigate to the relevant section of our website. Thank you for your understanding.
goBookOffer: We apologize, but it appears that you don't have any bookings for an offer at this time. Please visit our 'Book Offer' section to make a new booking. Thank you for choosing our services.
BookingRequest: We regret to inform you that we have not received any booking requests for your offer at this time. If you would like to promote your offer further, please consider sharing it on your social media channels or with your network. Thank you for choosing our platform to promote your services.
OffersNotAvailable: We're sorry to inform you that the offer you were looking for is currently unavailable. Our team is working hard to bring you the best deals and promotions, but unfortunately, we are unable to offer the particular deal at this time.
